languages.text: "Врагам Человечества нанесен удар. Достойное воздаяние за страдания, что эти чудовища причиняли невинным и слабым".
"The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."
languages.original_text: "Врагам Человечества нанесен удар. Достойное воздаяние за страдания, что эти чудовища причиняли невинным и слабым".

traits.locale_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “人类之敌遭受了打击。考虑到那些怪物对无辜者和弱者造成的痛苦，这样的惩罚十分合适。”
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."

traits.locale_text: “人类之敌遭受了打击。考虑到那些怪物对无辜者和弱者造成的痛苦，这样的惩罚十分合适。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Nous avons assurément porté un grand coup aux ennemis de l'humanité. Et ce n'est qu'un juste châtiment pour ce que ces monstres ont infligé aux faibles et aux innocents. »
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons assurément porté un grand coup aux ennemis de l'humanité. Et ce n'est qu'un juste châtiment pour ce que ces monstres ont infligé aux faibles et aux innocents. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Los enemigos de la Humanidad han sufrido un duro revés. Es justo castigo por el sufrimiento que esos monstruos han infligido a los inocentes y a los débiles».
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."

traits.locale_text: «Los enemigos de la Humanidad han sufrido un duro revés. Es justo castigo por el sufrimiento que esos monstruos han infligido a los inocentes y a los débiles».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「人類の敵は痛手を被った。こんな化け物どもが無実の者や弱者に与えた苦しみに対する、ふさわしい報復だ」
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."

traits.locale_text: 「人類の敵は痛手を被った。こんな化け物どもが無実の者や弱者に与えた苦しみに対する、ふさわしい報復だ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Den Feinden der Menschheit wurde ein schwerer Schlag versetzt. Eine angemessene Vergeltung für das Leid, das diese Monster den Unschuldigen und Schwachen zugefügt haben."
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."

traits.locale_text: "Den Feinden der Menschheit wurde ein schwerer Schlag versetzt. Eine angemessene Vergeltung für das Leid, das diese Monster den Unschuldigen und Schwachen zugefügt haben."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."

languages.text: "İnsanlığın düşmanları büyük bir darbe aldı. Bu canavarların masum ve zayıflara yaşattığı çileye layık bir karşılık."
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have been dealt a blow. Fitting retribution for the suffering these monsters have inflicted on the innocent and the weak."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlığın düşmanları büyük bir darbe aldı. Bu canavarların masum ve zayıflara yaşattığı çileye layık bir karşılık."
